dialog: Treat me well and I give you 🍎*apples*.
Treat me poorly and I’ll give you 🌳*lumber*.
It’s true. I am the *Tree of Knotty and Nice*…
So, my fruit must come in 🍐*pears*.
Welcome stranger, I am *Princess Die of Euia*…
The power of *mojick*, the transmutation of *emoji*, has faded from the land…
With it, all the *mojical creatures* have vanished…
The 🦄*unicorn* has not been seen since *The Fall*…
Hark! I’m the *Captain of the Guard*…
In the forest to the west, there is a 🌳*tree* that is quite unlike the others…
Soldiers use its 🍐*fruit* to improve their 💛*stamina*  when they travel in the *Eural Mountains*.
Hark! I’m *a sharp Major* in service to her Majesty 👸*Princess Dice*…
A *friend of mine* has gone missing in the *Eural Mountains*, to the south…
Please help them if you can!
I came here with my sturdy *pick axe* but I was trapped by this ⛰*boulder*…
There are 🥉*precious medals* in these mountains. One can make a fortune!
Greetings, I am *Phil*, a lesser demon of monetary exchange…
This is a branch of the *Bank of Dysia*…
While you’re here, we can exchange 🥉*precious medals*…
The Bank of Dysia provides all manner of exchanges.
This is a *forge* where we do honest *forgery*…
Place a medal in the forge to craft a useful component!
Did you know that you can sheer 🐑*sheep* with ✂️*scissors*?
That’s why scissors are an improvement over just 🔪*two knives*.
It’s hard to stay warm in the ❄️*frigid north*…
That’s why I knit myself a 🧥*jacket*…
I 🔪*whittled* my needles out of 🌲*soft wood*.
Fish can swim over the *edge of the world*…
I have seen *you people* make them with 🥄*shovels*.
Hoo many licks would it take to get to the center?
My brother, Herman, became an ordinary 🐟*fish* when they lost the sacred 🔱*trident*…
A trident is like a ⚜️*golden fleur* but with the points *twisted* upward…
I bet you would need a 🔨*hammer* /and/ a 🔧*wrench* to do intricate jewler’s work like that…
Thank you for restoring our sacred 🔱*trident*!
I saw one once, *west* of here…
Can you imagine, painting the clover 🥇*gold*?
I’m planted, but not a plant…
I’m inanimate, yet am an animal…
This island is Oc, the capital of Occia…
Within you encounter 🦈*the president of the bank*…
While you’re here, we can exchange 🥉*precious medals*…
We were once the powerful *Moji* of the north…
We were the stewards of the *Essence of Wind*…
We seek a student to pass on our knowledge…
They must construct for us an *umbrella*…
This must be the *Fist of Men*…
I am *Sal the Snake* and this is *Midia*, the center of *Daia*…
In this world torn between *knotty* and *nice*, I was *toadally newtral*, the *mojus of moji*…
When *mojick* returns, then will it be possible to restore me to my 🦎 *true form*, for I was once the *Sal the Mander*…
Thank you for restoring me to my *true form*. I am *Sal Mander*, The *Toadally Newtral*…
Go forth and restore the *mojick* of *Daia*!
Did you know ravens have 17 pinion feathers?
So, the difference is a matter of a pinion.
I serve no purpose in this game…
I am merely a talking head.
Caesar Salad is emperor of the Romaines…
Some say the Romaine religion is kale-tholic.
So, turn over a new leaf…
The seas of Occia have five islands…
Hi, I’m *Astrid*. Welcome to the *Royal Observatory*…
I’m an *astronomer*. I look to the 🌌night sky for clues.
Did you know that there’s a special tree that produces 🍃*bay leaves*?
Only the mojick of *water* can restore me.
There is a creature of Borea, far to the *north*, who 👃 *nose*what to do with me…
To the 🐇*rabbits*, I am wealth itself…
So you may call me *Warren Buffet*…
If you 🥄*dig* me, I am yours.
Hello, I’m *Justin*. Welcome to the *Clock Tower*…
At the clock tower, we can craft with *time*…
For example, crafting with *bread* and *water* here will produce *beer*!
Crafting with mushrooms can make some things *grow*…
Did you know that the mojical 🍀*four leaf clover* is lucky?
All we have now though are ordinary ☘️*three leaf clover*.
I’m the largest mammal ever to have lived…
I would give it all up to be a *narwhal*…
Narwhals were the unicorns of the sea.
I could go all about the frozen north unseen despite my enormity…
I am once again the *abominable snowman*…
Thank you for helping me through my illness. I hope my 🌡*thermometer* is useful to you.
*Crafting with cake* makes many things shrink!
Did you know that a male duck is a drake?…
Welcome to ye olde crochety guild…
The guild of knit pickers and sew and sews!
I wish there were a way to make our kitty 🐈*Sam* bigger.
Welcome to the city of Dis…
So there is a certain irony…
That one cannot waffle and also agree…
One might call it a waffle irony.
